Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for the web application, including configuration settings, feature flags, and key-value pairs that need to be managed.
Plan the structure of the configuration data, including namespaces, labels, and hierarchical organization for easy management and retrieval.
Provision an Azure App Configuration resource in the Azure portal, ensuring proper naming conventions and resource group placement.
Configure role-based access control (RBAC) for the Azure App Configuration resource to ensure only authorized users and applications can access it.
Add key-value pairs, feature flags, and other configuration settings to the Azure App Configuration resource based on the application's requirements.
Update the web application to retrieve configuration settings from Azure App Configuration using the SDK or REST API.
Enable encryption for sensitive configuration data and ensure secure communication between the web application and Azure App Configuration.
Configure monitoring and alerts for the Azure App Configuration resource to track usage, performance, and potential issues.
Perform thorough testing to ensure the web application correctly retrieves and applies configuration settings from Azure App Configuration.
Create detailed documentation for the configuration setup, including key-value pairs, feature flags, and integration steps.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting Azure App Configuration for the web application.
Ensure the configuration setup adheres to organizational and regulatory compliance requirements. Perform regular audits to verify compliance.
Use Azure Monitor to continuously track the health and performance of the App Configuration store. Identify and resolve any anomalies or issues.
Perform regular backups of configuration data to ensure recovery in case of accidental deletion or corruption.
Check the integrity of configuration values and settings to ensure they align with application requirements and are free of errors.
Review and update configuration settings to reflect changes in application requirements or new features.
Track the usage and performance of feature flags to ensure they are functioning as intended and do not negatively impact the application.
Conduct regular security audits to identify vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with organizational security policies.
Simulate failover scenarios to ensure the App Configuration store can recover and maintain availability during outages.
Analyze performance metrics and optimize the App Configuration store to reduce latency and improve responsiveness.
Review logs and audit trails to ensure all configuration changes are authorized and documented.
Ensure all sensitive data in the App Configuration store is encrypted using Azure's encryption standards.
Collect and analyze user feedback to identify areas for improvement in the App Configuration store's usability and performance.
